instructions: On your iPhone or iPad, open the Google+ app . Open the profile of the person you want to block. Tap More and then Block or Block profile .
On your iPhone or iPad, open the Google+ app . Open the post you want to mute. Tap More and then Mute or Mute post .
On your iPhone or iPad, open the Google+ app . Open the profile of the person you want to mute. Tap Menu . Tap Mute .
